sentence: Nelson trailed at 5 percent, and Wisconsin state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski came in at 3 percent support.

title: Marianne Williamson endorses Tom Nelson in Wisconsin Senate race

sentence: In many ways, Barnes, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson and state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski are following the political path Baldwin blazed.
